original_text: Now they that died in the plague were fourteen thousand and seven hundred, beside them that died about the matter of Korah.
korean_text: 고라의 일로 죽은 자 외에 염병에 죽은 자가 만 사천칠백 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: Now they that died in the plague
were fourteen thousand and seven hundred,
beside them that died about the matter of Korah.
